meanings.sent1: The prefired clay pots were ready for painting.
meanings.sent2: The prefired bricks were stronger than the regular ones.
meanings.sent3: The prefired cookies were already burnt before baking!
meanings.sent4: Her prefired determination made her unstoppable.
meanings.sent5: The prefired wood glowed with a warm intensity.

meanings.definition: Having been subjected to firing before use
meanings.sent1: The prefired ceramics were beautifully crafted.
meanings.sent2: The prefired glass was more durable than expected.
meanings.sent3: The prefired pizza was accidentally reheated!
meanings.sent4: His prefired ideas sparked creativity in the team.
meanings.sent5: The prefired metal shone with a unique sheen.
